ja472:9.3: mahante → mahatte (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr), ṭhapetuṃ → ṭhāpetuṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja472:12.1: Sabbova → sabbo ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), ekato → ekanto (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja472:13.2: gambhīre ca suduttare → gambhīre ca duruttare (sya1ed, sya2ed) | gambhīre suduruttare (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja472:16.4: Evaṃ → sukhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), attanaṃ → attanā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | attani (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) evaṃ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṃ gilitabaḷisaṃ purisamiva attānaṃ passāmīti (aṭṭha. saṃvaṇṇanā)
ja472:19.5: Rājaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ → ahaṃ tadā rājaputto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
